get_concept(ontology_version_id,concept_id,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 93
 93:     def get_concept ontology_version_id,concept_id,options={}
 94:       
 95:       options[:light]=(options[:light] && options[:light]!=0) ? 1 : 0
 96:       
 97:       concept_url="/concepts/%ID%?conceptid=%CONCEPT_ID%&"
 98:       concept_url=concept_url.gsub("%ID%",ontology_version_id.to_s)
 99:       concept_url=concept_url.gsub("%CONCEPT_ID%",URI.encode(concept_id))
100:       options.keys.each{|key| concept_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
101:       concept_url=concept_url[0..-2]
102:       
103:       full_concept_path=bioportal_base_rest_url+concept_url
104:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(full_concept_path))
105:       doc = parser.parse
106:       
107:       results = error_check doc
108: 
109:       unless results.nil?
110:         return results
111:       end
112: 
113:       return process_concepts_xml(doc).merge({:ontology_version_id=>ontology_version_id})
114:     end
get_concepts_for_ontology_version_id(ontology_version_id,options={})

options can include 

 - offset - the offet to start from
 - limit - the maximum number of terms returns

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 194
194:     def get_concepts_for_ontology_version_id ontology_version_id,options={}
195:       options[:offset]||=0
196:       uri="/concepts/#{ontology_version_id}/all?"
197:       options.keys.each{|k|uri+="#{k}=#{URI.encode(options[k].to_s)}&"}
198:       uri=uri[0..-2]
199:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url + uri
200:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(uri))
201:       doc = parser.parse
202: 
203:       concepts = error_check doc
204:       unless concepts.nil?
205:         return concepts
206:       end
207: 
208:       concepts=[]
209:       doc.find("/*/data/list/classBean").each{ |element|
210:         concepts << process_concept_bean_xml(element)
211:       }
212:       return concepts
213:       
214:     end
get_concepts_for_virtual_ontology_id(virtual_ontology_id,options={})

options can include 

 - offset - the offet to start from
 - limit - the maximum number of terms returns

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 219
219:     def get_concepts_for_virtual_ontology_id virtual_ontology_id,options={}
220:       uri="/virtual/ontology/#{virtual_ontology_id}/all?"
221:       options.keys.each{|k|uri+="#{k}=#{URI.encode(options[k])}&"}
222:       uri=uri[0..-2]
223:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url + uri
224:       
225:       doc = REXML::Document.new(open(uri))
226: 
227:       concepts = error_check doc
228:       unless concepts.nil?
229:         return concepts
230:       end
231: 
232:       concepts=[]
233:       #TODO: parse concept list (xml is different to single concept)
234:       return concepts
235: 
236:     end
get_ontology_details(ontology_version_id,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 116
116:     def get_ontology_details ontology_version_id,options={}
117:       ontologies_url="/ontologies/#{ontology_version_id}?"
118: 
119:       options.keys.each{|key| ontologies_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
120:       ontologies_url=ontologies_url[0..-2]
121:       url=bioportal_base_rest_url+ontologies_url
122:       
123:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(url))
124:       doc = parser.parse
125:       
126:       results = error_check doc
127: 
128:       unless results.nil?
129:         return results
130:       end
131: 
132:       doc.find("/*/data/ontologyBean").each{ |element|
133:         return parse_ontology_bean_xml(element)
134:       }
135:       
136:     end
get_ontology_versions(options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 171
171:     def get_ontology_versions options={}
172:       ontologies_url="/ontologies?"
173: 
174:       options.keys.each{|key| ontologies_url += "#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
175:       ontologies_url=ontologies_url[0..-2] #chop of trailing &
176:       uri=bioportal_base_rest_url+ontologies_url
177:       
178:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(uri))
179:       doc = parser.parse
180: 
181:       ontologies = error_check doc
182: 
183:       unless ontologies.nil?
184:         return ontologies
185:       end
186: 
187:       return parse_ontologies_xml doc
188:     end
search(query,options={})

[Source]

     # File lib/bioportal.rb, line 138
138:     def search query,options={}
139:       options[:pagesize] ||= 10
140:       options[:pagenum] ||= 0
141:       
142:       search_url="/search/%QUERY%?"
143:       options.keys.each {|key| search_url+="#{key.to_s}=#{URI.encode(options[key].to_s)}&"}
144:       search_url=search_url[0..-2] #chop of trailing &
145:       
146:       search_url=search_url.gsub("%QUERY%",URI.encode(query))
147:       full_search_path=bioportal_base_rest_url+search_url
148:       parser = XML::Parser.io(open(full_search_path))
149:       doc = parser.parse
150: 
151:       results = error_check doc
152: 
153:       unless results.nil?
154:         return results
155:       end
156: 
157:       results = []
158:       doc.find("/*/data/page/contents/searchResultList/searchBean").each{ |element|
159:         results << parse_search_result(element)
160:       }
161: 
162:       pages = 1
163:       doc.find("/*/data/page").each{|element|
164:         pages = element.first.find(element.path + "/numPages").first.content
165:       }
166: 
167:       return results.uniq,pages
168: 
169:     end
